name: A Prismatic Ring [<*white*>]
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration an average amount.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance strongly.
The Prismatic ring alters the wearer's resistances.
The Prismatic ring will change from resistance to resistance.
